posts.postText:
Awesome, thank you very much.
If you tell us what you'd like to grief protect in-game, we'll gladly do that.
I know what I want to Grief protect, but I haven't made it yet XD

You also get chestlock and donator status. type /lwc in-game for moar details.

I am known to have terrible memory, so if we deny you your rightful grief protection later on just link one of us to this post.
